Package main.controllers

Class Store

java.lang.Object
main.controllers.Store
All Implemented Interfaces:
IData
public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
implements IData
The Store class represents a store that sells computers and printers. It implements the IData interface to provide a method for checking device availability. It also has methods for creating computers and printers, printing lists of available computers and printers, and creating purchases. This class uses the singleton pattern to ensure that there is only one instance of the Store class.
See Also:
IData

    Store​(IMenuManager menuManager, PurchaseManager purchaseManager)
    Private constructor for the Store class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createComputers()
    Creates a computer and adds it to the list of available computers.
    void createPrinters()
    Creates a printer and adds it to the list of available printers.
    void createPurchase()
    Creates a new purchase based on user input and sends it to the purchase manager to be processed.
    static Store getInstance​(IMenuManager menuManager, PurchaseManager purchaseManager)
    Returns the instance of the Store class.
    boolean isDeviceAvailable​(int id)
    Checks if a device with the given id is available in the store.
    void printComputers()
    Prints a list of available computers in the store with their details.
    void printPrinters()
    Prints a list of all the printers in the store with their details.

    • Store

      public Store​(IMenuManager menuManager, PurchaseManager purchaseManager)
      Private constructor for the Store class. To create an instance of the Store class, use the getInstance() method.
      Parameters:
      menuManager - the IMenuManager to be used by the Store instance
      purchaseManager - the PurchaseManager to be used by the Store instance

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Store getInstance​(IMenuManager menuManager, PurchaseManager purchaseManager)
      Returns the instance of the Store class. If an instance has not yet been created, it will create one.
      Parameters:
      menuManager - the IMenuManager to be used by the Store instance
      purchaseManager - the PurchaseManager to be used by the Store instance
      Returns:
      the instance of the Store class

    • createComputers

      public void createComputers() throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates a computer and adds it to the list of available computers.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if there is an error generating an ID for the computer

    • createPrinters

      public void createPrinters() throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates a printer and adds it to the list of available printers.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if there is an error generating an ID for the printer

    • printComputers

      public void printComputers()
      Prints a list of available computers in the store with their details.

    • printPrinters

      public void printPrinters()
      Prints a list of all the printers in the store with their details.

    • isDeviceAvailable

      public boolean isDeviceAvailable​(int id)
      Checks if a device with the given id is available in the store.
      Specified by:
      isDeviceAvailable in interface IData
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the device to check for availability.
      Returns:
      true if a device with the given id is available, false otherwise.

    • createPurchase

      public void createPurchase() throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates a new purchase based on user input and sends it to the purchase manager to be processed.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - If an error occurs while creating or processing the purchase.
